description: The boy who has been dating Kashiwagi, thanks to Shirogane`s help, comes back yet again for more relationship advice from Shirogane. But something seems different about him. With his return from summer vacation, he has completely transformed into a player. Getting advice was just an excuse to brag about his girlfriend to Shirogane and Ishigami, and the two suspect that he has "experienced nirvana." They decide to leave the couple alone and observe them from afar as the two lovebirds start to get into a romantic mood...

titles.title: Ai Hayasaka Wants to Stave Them Off / The Student Council Has Not Achieved Nirvana / Kaguya Wants to Get Married / Kaguya Wants to Celebrate
Hayasaka Ai veut défendre / Le BDE n`y croit pas / Kaguya veut se marier / Kaguya veut célébrer
Hayasaka Ai wa Fusegitai / Seitokai wa Kamitte Nai / Kaguya-sama wa Kekkon Shitai / Kaguya-sama wa Iwaitai
هاياساكا آي تريد أن تدافع / مجلس الطلبة لم يبلغ السعادة المطلقة / كاغويا-ساما تريد أن تتزوج / كاغويا-ساما تريد أن تحتفل
早坂愛は防ぎたい / 生徒会は神ってない / かぐや様は結婚したい / かぐや様は祝いたい
